EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Microsoft Cloud Native Workshop_Omaha_Q217.OmahaConfirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Workshop in Omaha on May 30th. We hope you will leave this workshop with a better understanding of cloud-native development <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and how to adopt it moving forward. If you would like to participate in hands-on exercises please bring a laptop.
Date: Tuesday, May 30, 2017
Time:
11:00AM to 4:00PM
Location: Microsoft Omaha 2111 South 67th Street, Suite 100 Omaha, NE, 68106 (map)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there! {{my.Cloud-Native Workshop Omaha:default=edit me}} The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop-omaha.html]]>
